SEARCH
Module OOP
Package OOPProject

Interface AdminStaffManagement

All Known Implementing Classes:
StaffCSV
public interface AdminStaffManagement
Interface for managing the administration of hospital staff, including administrators, doctors, and pharmacists. It provides methods to add staff members and write their details to a CSV file.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    addAdmin(String hospitalId, String password, Role role, Gender gender, String administratorName, Boolean firstTimeLogin)
    Adds a new administrator to the system.
    void
    addDoctor(String hospitalId, String password, Role role, Gender gender, String doctorName, String department, String specialisation, Boolean firstTimeLogin)
    Adds a new doctor to the system.
    void
    addPharmacist(String hospitalId, String password, Role role, Gender gender, String pharmacistName, Boolean firstTimeLogin)
    Adds a new pharmacist to the system.
    void
    writeToCSV(Object staffMember)
    Writes the details of a staff member to a CSV file.

  • Method Details

    • addAdmin

      void addAdmin(String hospitalId, String password, Role role, Gender gender, String administratorName, Boolean firstTimeLogin)
      Adds a new administrator to the system.
      Parameters:
      hospitalId - The unique identifier for the hospital.
      password - The password for the administrator.
      role - The role of the administrator (e.g., manager, supervisor).
      gender - The gender of the administrator.
      administratorName - The name of the administrator.
      firstTimeLogin - A flag indicating whether this is the first time the administrator is logging in.

    • addDoctor

      void addDoctor(String hospitalId, String password, Role role, Gender gender, String doctorName, String department, String specialisation, Boolean firstTimeLogin)
      Adds a new doctor to the system.
      Parameters:
      hospitalId - The unique identifier for the hospital.
      password - The password for the doctor.
      role - The role of the doctor (e.g., general physician, specialist).
      gender - The gender of the doctor.
      doctorName - The name of the doctor.
      department - The department where the doctor works (e.g., cardiology).
      specialisation - The specialisation of the doctor (e.g., surgery).
      firstTimeLogin - A flag indicating whether this is the first time the doctor is logging in.

    • addPharmacist

      void addPharmacist(String hospitalId, String password, Role role, Gender gender, String pharmacistName, Boolean firstTimeLogin)
      Adds a new pharmacist to the system.
      Parameters:
      hospitalId - The unique identifier for the hospital.
      password - The password for the pharmacist.
      role - The role of the pharmacist (e.g., dispensing, clinical).
      gender - The gender of the pharmacist.
      pharmacistName - The name of the pharmacist.
      firstTimeLogin - A flag indicating whether this is the first time the pharmacist is logging in.

    • writeToCSV

      void writeToCSV(Object staffMember)
      Writes the details of a staff member to a CSV file.
      Parameters:
      staffMember - The staff member whose information needs to be written. This can be any staff type (administrator, doctor, pharmacist).
